price: ‹ ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߣߵߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߬ ߣߴߌ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ߕߌ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
